items.headline: This longer-term mortgage won’t make housing affordable — and could wreck your retirement

items.headline: Dow gains almost 500 points, S&P 500 ends shy of record high after Fed’s final rate cut of 2025 bolsters case for early start to ‘Santa Claus rally’
items.summary_en: The S&P 500 index narrowly missed a fresh record close Wednesday and the Dow Jones Industrial Average finished with strong gains after the Federal Reserve’s decision to deliver a final quarter-point rate cut for 2025, which gave investors optimism that equities can keep climbing through year-end.
